title: Nemesis Draft - Who Are Your Top Picks?!
body:
I'm curious who you guys are choosing for your enemies! 

I've only played one so far, and I gave the enemy team {{champion:82}}.

replies.body:
> river{{champion:98}} 

SHHHHH!!!!!
Gave the enemy {{champion:6}}  one game. Funny thing is I gave it to someone who actually has like 500 ranked wins with Urgot...

> [{quoted}](name=Aziriously OP,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rcRy50Ny,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-02-12T23:10:28.009+0000)
>
> Gave the enemy {{champion:6}}  one game. Funny thing is I gave it to someone who actually has like 500 ranked wins with Urgot...

gj

I feel like there are quite a few strategies to this the two most prominent being:

1. weak champs
2. difficult champs

I would probably pick {{champion:112}} as my pick for the enemy team. He's one of the hardest champs to play in the game, and if no one on the enemy team knows how to play Viktor or Rumble (who's ult has the same casting paradigm as Viktor's E, the hardest part of his kit to use), then that's a fairly easy win.

i've gotten viktor 3 times and he's my main :D 
i got 29/1 the first
26/5 the second
and 41/6 the third xD

Unfortunately, the problem with picking difficult champs is that there's still a good chance that somebody will still know how to play him. With 5 people to pick from there's a good chance at least one of them will do well with him.

For instance, if our team got {{champion:112}}  and nobody wanted him, I'd take him. I'm fairly decent with him anyway.
Haven't tried yet... but I plan on passing along {{champion:34}} . So few people play her, they'll hopefully be screwed

> [{quoted}](name=Solidair3,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rcRy50Ny,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-12T21:26:58.830+0000)
>
> Haven't tried yet... but I plan on passing along {{champion:34}} . So few people play her, they'll hopefully be screwed

Please pass me the anivia

> [{quoted}](name=Solidair3,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rcRy50Ny,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-12T21:26:58.830+0000)
>
> Haven't tried yet... but I plan on passing along {{champion:34}} . So few people play her, they'll hopefully be screwed

I hope i play with u next. I'd love anivia
If I ever got {{champion:43}} I'd be laughing all the way to the victory screen.  {{champion:111}} too.

A same for {{champion:12}}

I just love his Headbutt-> Towershot -> Pulverise -> Towershot -> Towershot -> Kill combo (;
Always trying to give Eve, she's just too weak in the jg, can't lane, and has no early pressure because of the damage she takes early.
Lmao no shes not, she rapes as jungle, and she can go assassin or mage or tank. I got her two games and I dont even play her and went 14/5/11
there is no real difference between normal games and this mode while in normal games there is the fight for who pick lee win in this mode there is the fight for who pick urgot

oh ye of little little faith.
Bow to the greatness of the urgod!
I've been giving people {{champion:60}} cuz no one at my elo can play her
Funny, somebody did that to me. I'd literally never played her before, but I ended up going 9/0/7.
I play {{champion:60}} a lot, so  would be more than happy for someone to give me her < 3. DON'T UNDERESTIMATE ELISE, I have carried a game or 2 with her.

{{champion:55}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:92}} 

I like a challenge...
I ran out of time and accidentally gave Varus... the loading screen skintimidation was awful. He had arctic ops on and almost out did our team.

I gave the enemy Yorick, and the second time I gave them Poppy. And just now I gave them Quinn because it was an all adc team we were making them play :P

{{champion:83}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:133}}
I wish someone would give me poppy, but someone always bans her.
Pass me the {{champion:133}} . If anyone gave me quinn, ooooh there would be lots of fun
"Give them all supports", judging by how well that worked both times my team tried that last night, doesn't seem like the best strategy.
too much CC and their damage can be ok to great.

I ask my team to pick them AD only. I played my first games witha  team of opponents just being: urgot, cait, mf, vayne and varus. Varus we didnt want becus of her stun but still. We raped them after 10min :D. NO CC And ARMOR 100%.

Other thing is: pick them champs from 1 kind (ap/ad)

Someone gave me Hecarim my first game.  Oh the poor fools had no idea how much the new items and the jungle buffs made Hecarim better.  Not only can you build him movespeed now, but he can simultaneously be tanky as shit.  It was glorious.  Suffering is Magic! {{champion:120}}

Zilean =b
{{champion:26}}
GIVE ME ZILEAN DO IT DO IT I DARE YOU DO IT DO IT
Hahaha {{item:3157}}
I like playing Urgot.  Come at me!

Only played one so far, I was going to give Nunu but team decided I should give Zac, so I went with that. My team also gave them Aatrox, so they had revive passives for days. They gave me Amumu though, one of my best champions; I didn't even jungle (I took ignite because we didn't have a standard team comp anyways, so might as well. I just roamed around the map ganking people and soaking exp; I had so many kills lol)

i always give {{champion:28}} 

but recently i have been getting my team to give all adcs because it works. they cant comeback when they get behind and if you build thornmail its guaranteed gg

I love giving people Nunu.  

For some reason people kept giving me Eve, which was fine because I'd just jungle with her and carry easily lol.

OH theres a new game mode thats out? Huh.... didnt realize. i remember reading something about it on the pbe. And thought "if you're just picking someone elses champion then, thats kinda boring" didnt realize it was released. Whoops!
I like to give the other team {{champion:60}}  since most people can't seem to play her well. I like when she is given to me though.
{{champion:33}} can be good as a later pick, depending on how much ap/ad they give you.

Give the enemy team 4 AD champs and one useless tank (like Nautilus). Then have your team all build thornmail, sunfire, and armor. You can easily kill them. 

If you get Taric, even better.

I've given...

Galio (we lost because they also had mao, udyr, and corki)
Garen (won)
Zac or swain, I forget (won)

I've played nami twice.  It was nice when I was paired with an awesome braum, not so nice when I had to go top againt mao because we had 500 supports on my team.  Worse part is in that game I had the best CS on my team...

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rcRy50Ny,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-12T21:15:08.997+0000)
>
> I've given...
> 
> Galio (we lost because they also had **mao, udyr, and corki**)

For the next match we will give them weak and unpopular picks such as {{champion:150}}, {{champion:39}} ,{{champion:59}}, {{champion:64}},  {{champion:429}}, and {{champion:15}} . What could go wrong huehuehue...
Given them that team was totally not my fault.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rcRy50Ny,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-02-13T15:40:24.448+0000)
>
> Given them that team was totally not my fault.

I know it was a joke.
I always get {{champion:27}}. Like 5 games with him, i still suck with him.

When they give me {{champion:44}} , i laugh, because one does not simply 1v1 a fed ad taric.
Edit: teamfights end pretty badly for them too.
Gave them Eve, they gave us Ashe because they didnt realize how op adcs are when you make the enemy team have zilean, alistar, Janna, Evelynn and Poppy.

How the heck did they manage to loose with that?

AD Zilean, Alistar Top, Janna Mid, Evelynn Jungle and Poppy Supp ...
They went Zilean mid, Alistar and Janna bot, eve jungle and poppy top, our cho gath was really good and was able to mess up the poppy who never became a threat.
